thread.title: Lucas Matthysse looks for his next KO in showcase vs Postol
thread.title_full: Lucas Matthysse looks for his next KO in showcase vs Postol - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Greg Beacham, Ap Sports Writer
title: Lucas Matthysse looks for his next KO in showcase vs Postol
text: Photo: Jae C. Hong, AP FILE - This June 23, 2012, file photo Lucas Matthysse, top, of Argentina, celebrates his TKO victory against Humberto Soto, of Mexico, after a WBC lightweight boxing match in Los Angeles. Matthysse is an Argentine knockout artist who became a favorite fighter of smart boxing fans over the past decade. He could win a world title belt for the first time Saturday, Oct. 3, when he meets Ukraine's unbeaten Viktor Postol in Carson, Calif. FILE - This June 23, 2012, file photo Lucas Matthysse, top, of... LOS ANGELES (AP) — Lucas Matthysse fought his way out of Argentine club shows and into North America's biggest rings over the past decade, building a reputation among smart boxing fans as an unmissable brawler with a dramatic flair. FILE - This June 23, 2012, file photo Lucas Matthysse, top, of Argentina, celebrates his TKO victory against Humberto Soto, of Mexico, after a WBC lightweight boxing match in Los Angeles. Matthysse is an Argentine knockout artist who became a favorite fighter of smart boxing fans over the past decade. He could win a world title belt for the first time Saturday, Oct. 3, when he meets Ukraine's unbeaten Viktor Postol in Carson, Calif. FILE - This June 23, 2012, file photo Lucas Matthysse, top, of... LOS ANGELES (AP) — Lucas Matthysse fought his way out of Argentine club shows and into North America's biggest rings over the past decade, building a reputation among smart boxing fans as an unmissable brawler with a dramatic flair.
